thread.title: 69. New Edition's Greatest Hits, Vol. 1 - New Edition
thread.title_full: 69. New Edition's Greatest Hits, Vol. 1 - New Edition

title: 69. New Edition's Greatest Hits, Vol. 1 - New Edition
text:
11 Songs Album Review 
For anyone who missed New Edition in either its Jackson 5 imitation phase or final days as a funkier, more aggressive urban contemporary vocal group with a slight dance influence, this collection contains examples of both incarnations. Kiddie-pop hits such as "Candy Girl," "Cool It Now," and "Mr. Telephone Man" are included, along with their final hits "If It Isn't Love," "Can You Stand the Rain," and the appropriately titled "Is This the End." This anthology shows how dominant New Edition was during the 1980s and early '90s. Customer Reviews 1 of my favorite songs I luv "If It Isn't Love." It haz got tah be my all-time favorite song ID GIVE IT MORE STARS IF I COULD im 14 years old and obvously born in the 90's and i lOOOOVVVEE New Edition!!!! Missing one important song.
